description: [``botocore``] This release will enable two features: Firelens log driver, and Execute Command on Batch jobs on ECS. Both features will be passed through to ECS.
[``botocore``] Added standaloneAccountRateTypeSelections for GetPreferences and UpdatePreferences APIs. Added STALE enum value to status attribute in GetBillScenario and UpdateBillScenario APIs.
[``botocore``] bedrock flow now support node action trace.

[``botocore``] Adding support for the new parameter "ScanFilters" in the CloudFormation StartResourceScan API. When this parameter is included, the StartResourceScan API will initiate a scan limited to the resource types specified by the parameter.
[``botocore``] This release adds new action type of Create Listing Changeset for the Metadata Enforcement Rule feature.
[``botocore``] Added support for BOTTLEROCKET FIPS AMIs to AMI types in US regions.
[``botocore``] Amazon GameLift Servers add support for additional instance types.
[``botocore``] Update IAM dual-stack endpoints for BJS, IAD and PDT partitions
[``botocore``] add: recovery mode for SageMaker Studio apps
[``botocore``] This release adds AwsAdditionalDetails in the CreateTokenWithIAM API response.
